topics.body:
"@ParagonCommander":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559c541163687221d4002095#post_559c541163687221d4002095
I think tumblr went overboard a long time ago, cause if they've reached the point where there's a shoplifting fandom and fandoms dedicated to criminal activities that's going to get the fbi on their asses.

To use a equivalent (I know it's not a logical analogy, but bear with me) on 4chan why was there such a drastic change from people that use 4chan now (ie the crowd that you can swear has single digit IQ) to old /b/?  Cause back in the day it reached the point where the fbi cracked down hard on the site and now the site admins have to report any illegal activity.

I wouldn't be surprised if in say 5 years all the shit that goes on tumblr has the cops constantly monitoring cause let's rack up all the shit tumblrites do: large scale theft, cyber terrorism, identity theft, swatting (swatting under usa law is terrorism), large scale fraud (sjw), the list goes on.


Considering the shit that has happened over the past couple of years I wouldn't be surprised if the fucking fbi kicks open the CEO for tumblr's office door and goes "we're in charge now or you're going to prison".  That's pretty much what happened to 4chan was that the party van told moot he could either work with police, shut down the site or go to prison.
